```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(palmerpenguins)
library(ggplot2)
data(package = 'palmerpenguins')
```


```{r}
head(penguins)

```


```{r}
plot(penguins$flipper_length_mm, penguins$bill_length_mm)
```


```{r}
plot(penguins$flipper_length_mm, penguins$bill_length_mm, col=penguins$species,
     ylab = "Bill length (mm)",
     xlab = "Flipper length (mm)",
     pch = 3)

```

```{r}
hist(penguins$flipper_length_mm, col=penguins$species)
```
